subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Cycling’s governing body appealed to the highest court in sports after the Italian rider Franco Pellizotti was cleared of doping despite irregularities in his biological passport.
snippet: Cycling’s governing body appealed to the highest court in sports after the Italian rider Franco Pellizotti was cleared of doping despite irregularities in his biological passport.
